name: cc-in-out
description: Cookie consent banner with opt-in/out and other features.

scripts.build: npm run bundle && java -jar node_modules/google-closure-compiler/compiler.jar --warning_level=VERBOSE --jscomp_off=globalThis --jscomp_off=checkTypes --language_in=ECMASCRIPT5_STRICT --js build/cookieconsent.bundle.js --js_output_file build/cookieconsent.min.js

author: Fyrestar
